page.title: 13Landscape.
page.content: In Kylerhea the hills are mostly covered in heather.Kylerhea is quite rocky and in some places it is very boggy.From Kylerhea you can see Glenelg.Lots of trees have been planted by the forestry commision on the hill.Thereare some streams and rivers on the hill.There is a main river which all the streams run into it is called the Kylrhea river.It runs through the Kylerhea Glen.There is a hill called Bein Bhuidhe.In the sea channel at Kylerhea there is quite a strong current because the channel is not very wide.
